message:
MIKU EXPO General Ticket Onsale will take place on Friday 5th April 2024 at 10AM GMT

Tour Schedule:

Saturday 26th of October 2024 - London, UK @ OVO Arena Wembley
Monday 28th of October 2024 - Brussels, Belgium @ ING Arena
Tuesday 29th of October 2024 - Paris, France @ Zénith - Paris La Villette
Wednesday 30th of October 2024 - Amsterdam, Netherlands @ AFAS Live
Friday 1st of November 2024 - Düsseldorf, Germany @ Mitsubishi Electric Halle
Saturday 2nd of November 2024 - Berlin, Germany @ Uber Eats Music Hall
title: Hatsune Miku Expo 2024 Europe Tour
